Alert Name: bush
College cost reduction bill introduced
Bill in House calls for increases to federal student grants and loan limits, and cuts to lender subisidies, which would boost student aid.
06/12/07 05:58 PM, EDT
The Democratic chairman of the House Education Committee Tuesday introduced a bill to slash subsidies to student loan firms such as Sallie Mae and boost student grants.
FULL STORY
